rows.Summarized Problem: Game performance has degraded after the One UI 8.0 Beta update, with poor graphics detection and severe frame drops despite standard settings.
rows.Severity Reason: The device experiences severe lag and overheating during gameplay, making the experience unusable and impacting core functionality.

rows.Title: None of the contacts photo gets displayed in widget
rows.Problem: Lockstar application app widgets are not working correctly after beta update installation. If i am trying to add contacts widget, none of the contacts photo gets displayed. Also everytime i add left and right bottom corner applications they get removed on restart.
rows.Summarized Problem: Contacts photos do not display in the contacts widget after a beta update.
rows.Severity Reason: The widget fails to show contact photos, which is a partial malfunction affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Video not playing in full screen in facebook
rows.Problem: Full-screen video not playing in Facebook live and recorded videos; there is lots of blank space around the video and the video screen size is too small, even on a large screen like S24 Ultra. This issue occurs only in Facebook.
rows.Summarized Problem: Facebook video playback fails in full screen with excessive blank space and a small video size.
rows.Severity Reason: The video playback fails entirely in full screen, which is a core functionality for user experience on Facebook, making it unusable.

rows.Title: My Files app stutters when going to internal storage
rows.Problem: My Files app stutters when going to internal storage option from any other folder
rows.Summarized Problem: The My Files app slows down or stutters when navigating to the internal storage option from any folder.
rows.Severity Reason: The app experiences stuttering during navigation, which affects usability but does not cause device failure or data loss.

rows.Title: Now Brief not updating data
rows.Problem: The Now Brief won't update properly and won't appear on the lockscreen.
rows.Summarized Problem: The Now Brief feature fails to update and does not appear on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing from the lock screen and does not update, but the device remains otherwise functional.

rows.Title: Unable to change widget shapes
rows.Problem: Home up is messing up with every widget shape on homescreen
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot change widget shapes on the lock screen, and the home up function causes widget shapes to malfunction.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget functionality but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Secure Folder While upload files not displaying
rows.Problem: When initiating a file upload in the Secure Folder, the system is not displaying files from the Secure Folder and instead shows files from the personal, non-secure directory.
rows.Summarized Problem: File upload in the Secure Folder does not show files from the Secure Folder and displays files from the personal directory instead.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes incorrect file visibility but does not result in device crash or complete failure of core functionality.

rows.Title: App suggestion page always displays in light mode
rows.Problem: My search bar area is always in light mode even if I turn on dark mode
rows.Summarized Problem: The app suggestion page consistently displays in light mode despite the user enabling dark mode.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects a specific UI element under dark mode settings but does not prevent device operation or cause crashes.

rows.Title: The back swipe preview is not working properly
rows.Problem: The predictive back gesture does not work and is inconsistent, sometimes failing entirely. It feels like the system forgets the feature is present, and it only works in very limited places even in native Samsung apps.
rows.Summarized Problem: The predictive back gesture in settings does not work consistently and fails frequently, even in native Samsung apps.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature works intermittently and fails in multiple contexts, indicating a partial malfunction rather than complete failure or device unusability.

rows.Title: Unable to apply video wallpaper for homescreen
rows.Problem: UI crash occurred after setting video wallpaper, now only lock screen supports video wallpaper option; homescreen no longer shows the option despite previous functionality.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users can no longer set video wallpapers on the homescreen after a UI crash, with the feature now only available on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents users from using a core feature on the homescreen, rendering the home screen experience incomplete and unusable.

rows.Title: Bixby misunderstands my commands, replace the 'T' in 'Shahjeet' with a 'D'
rows.Problem: Bixby often misunderstands my commands, especially with names. It might replace the 'T' in 'Shahjeet' with a 'D'. Google Assistant works flawlessly and currently requires me to press the power button to activate, which is not ideal. I would like the option to select either Bixby or Google Assistant as the default, or use both seamlessly.
rows.Summarized Problem: Bixby misinterprets names such as 'Shahjeet' by replacing the 'T' with 'D', and requires manual activation via the power button, unlike Google Assistant which works flawlessly and can be used hands-free.
rows.Severity Reason: Bixby misinterprets commands and requires manual activation, impacting usability but does not cause device malfunction or data loss.

rows.Title: Widget shape have changes from 1st beta
rows.Problem: The widgets are not curved. They were beautiful in first beta now look off. I'm certain this is a bug since it shows the curves in the widgets but when apply it becomes boxy
rows.Summarized Problem: Widgets are no longer curved and appear boxy instead of curved, differing from the first beta version.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Suddenly half of the screen went black
rows.Problem: Suddenly half of the screen went black, even the auto rotate was off.
rows.Summarized Problem: The display suddenly shows half of the screen as black, even when auto-rotation is disabled.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial screen blackout, rendering part of the device unusable.

rows.Title: Device restart automatically
rows.Problem: My phone s24 is suddenly switched off and not able to restart for 5 minutes, after which the phone is lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: A Samsung Galaxy S24 suddenly shuts off and fails to restart, resulting in significant lag after reboot.
rows.Severity Reason: The device unexpectedly shuts off and fails to restart, rendering it unusable for a period and causing severe lag after power recovery.

rows.Title: Sleep Tracking Issue After Updating to UI 8 Beta: Missing Sleep Details When Watch is Removed for Charging
rows.Problem: After updating to UI 8 beta, sleep details are not showing when the watch is removed for charging. Previously, if the user got up multiple times at night, the watch would show wake-up times and sleep details upon waking. Now, only the time when the watch is removed for charging is recorded, and no data is shown for nighttime activity. This is critical for a heart patient.
rows.Summarized Problem: Sleep tracking stops working when the watch is removed for charging, showing only the charging time instead of full sleep activity.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue prevents accurate monitoring of sleep patterns, which is critical for a heart patient using the feature for health management.

rows.Title: Notifications Max 2 notifications are showing in cards view others in icon only
rows.Problem: Only two notifications are shown in the cards view on lockscreen; any new notifications after the second one show up as an icon.
rows.Summarized Problem: On the lock screen, only two notifications are displayed in the cards view, and additional notifications appear as icons.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of notification display, affecting user experience but does not render the device unusable or cause crashes.

rows.Title: Music wave effect not coming in music card progress
rows.Problem: The music wave effect is no longer visible on the quick panel and notification bar, only appearing on the lock screen. It needs to display on the lock screen whatever animated scene any music app provides while playing music to make the Samsung interface look classic.
rows.Summarized Problem: The music wave effect is missing from the quick panel and notification bar, and only visible on the lock screen, where it should display animated music scenes from any music app.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects visual feedback during music playback but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes or data loss.

rows.Title: Live Notification showing cropped

rows.Title: Wallpaper and Style The color pallete doesn't change with wallpaper change
rows.Problem: The color pallete doesn't change with wallpaper change, everytime we have to turn off and on to see the new colors and then apply. The new pallete should be selected and applied by default.

rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes a partial malfunction where the feature fails to respond to a normal user action, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Screen lag and resolution issues observed when routine is observed

rows.Summarized Problem: Screen lags and appears in tablet mode with small text when night time routines activate.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes noticeable performance degradation and visual inconsistency during routine execution, but does not render the device unusable.

rows.Title: Sound Issues observed in sound after ending the call
rows.Problem: After ending a call, media sounds are muted or the device still thinks I'm in a call even after the call has ended.
rows.Summarized Problem: Media sounds are muted after ending a call, even though the call has ended.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial functionality failure in audio during call end, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: Call drop observed
rows.Problem: Frequent call drops. Not able to hear voice on other side, this is happening frequently.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users experience frequent call drops and are unable to hear the other party's voice during calls.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops prevent users from making or receiving calls, rendering a core communication function unusable.

rows.Title: Asphalt legend game crash
rows.Problem: Asphalt legends game crashes frequently, unsure if due to One UI8 or other factors

rows.Severity Reason: The game crashes frequently, making it unusable and preventing normal gameplay.

rows.Title: Secure folder does not prompt for fingerprint or password on re-entry
rows.Problem: Secure Folder does not prompt for fingerprint or password on re-entry, even when "lock every time" is enabled. Once unlocked, user can leave to another app or home screen, return, and Secure Folder opens directly without asking for authentication. Expected: Always request authentication. Actual: Folder stays open until manually locked.
rows.Summarized Problem: Secure Folder fails to prompt for authentication upon re-entry, even when 'lock every time' is enabled, leading to reduced security protection.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue undermines the device's security mechanism by allowing unauthorized access without authentication after re-entry.

rows.Title: Unable to block number in phone book
rows.Problem: I can't block my number not in phone book. It's not block automatically. Please help me. I used third party app (turecaller). It's working properly. Your method is only unknown number and sparm call not automatically. Numbers not in phonebook only people in your phonebook will be able to call you. It's option not showing samsung calling app. Please do something please.
rows.Summarized Problem: Users cannot block numbers not in their phone book, and the option to block unknown numbers is missing in the Samsung Calling app.
rows.Severity Reason: The feature is missing for numbers not in the phone book, but the core functionality for blocking numbers is still available for contacts in the phone book.

rows.Title: Music begins playing unexpectedly once an app is closed
rows.Problem: Unexpected music starts playing out of nowhere after closing an app. Persists and plays over other media. Has happened twice so far. After the first appearance of the issue, restarted the phone. For the second, automatically stopped as soon as I opened Members app and the phone started generating log reports.
rows.Summarized Problem: Music plays unexpectedly after closing apps and continues playing over other media.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes unexpected audio playback that interferes with normal device usage and other media, leading to a disruptive user experience.

rows.Title: WhatsApp GIF is not working post update to one ui 8
rows.Problem: WhatsApp GIF is not working after updating to one ui beta version
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp GIF functionality is not working after updating to one ui 8.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue involves a partial malfunction of a feature in WhatsApp after an update, but does not cause device freezing or complete failure.

rows.Title: Text seems to be misaligned in lockscreen
rows.Problem: Text seems to be misaligned
rows.Summarized Problem: Text is misaligned on the lock screen.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue is a minor UI misalignment and does not affect device usability or core functionality.

rows.Title: Sudden Device Lag and Response Drop Post Charging Completion
rows.Problem: Suddenly the response is my device reduced or dropped suddenly after unplugging from the charging completed for stuck and lagging
rows.Summarized Problem: The device experiences sudden lag and reduced responsiveness after completing charging and unplugging.
rows.Severity Reason: The device becomes unresponsive after charging, which significantly impacts usability and basic operation.

rows.Title: Heating Issue During Android Auto Usage
rows.Problem: Heating issue in android car play
rows.Summarized Problem: The device heats up during Android Auto usage.
rows.Severity Reason: The device overheats during use of Android Auto, which could lead to performance degradation or device shutdown.

rows.Title: No background blur in lockscreen app widgets
rows.Problem: There is no background blur in lockscreen app widgets added with Lockstar.
rows.Summarized Problem: Lockscreen app widgets lack background blur.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects widget appearance but does not prevent device usage or cause crashes.

rows.Title: WhatsApp voice note play very low sound
rows.Problem: WhatsApp voice note and voice recordings play very low sound
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp voice notes and voice recordings play at very low volume.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects audio playback but does not cause device failure or complete unavailability of functionality.

rows.Title: Camera cutout showing in landscape mode
rows.Problem: While offline or online video being played in landscape it shows cutout on all videos being played, video player open in background while responding to this request.
rows.Summarized Problem: A cutout appears on all videos when played in landscape mode on the device display.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue affects video playback in landscape mode but does not cause device crash or complete failure of functionality.

rows.Title: The icon doesn't become transparent
rows.Problem: The icon doesn't become transparent when set to 20% transparency, only working intermittently as shown in the screenshot
rows.Summarized Problem: The icon on the lock screen does not become transparent when set to 20% transparency, only working intermittently.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes partial malfunction of the lock screen customization feature, but does not render the device unusable or cause data loss.

rows.Title: WhatsApp keeps crashing everytime
rows.Problem: WhatsApp keeps crashing everytime I open it
rows.Summarized Problem: WhatsApp crashes every time it is opened.
rows.Severity Reason: The app crashes on opening, making it unusable for communication.

rows.Title: Call drop during call
rows.Problem: After the One UI 8 beta update, I am facing call drops all the time. I can't talk to others during calls. Please, this is a serious issue that I am facing constantly. I request Samsung Care to fix this as soon as possible.
rows.Summarized Problem: Call drops occur frequently during phone calls after the One UI 8 beta update, preventing users from communicating effectively.
rows.Severity Reason: Call drops prevent users from making or receiving calls, rendering the device unusable for basic communication.

rows.Title: Apps is sleep state still consuming battery
rows.Problem: Apps that are slated for sleep are still consuming battery.
rows.Summarized Problem: Apps in sleep state continue to consume battery instead of entering true sleep mode.
rows.Severity Reason: Device battery drains unexpectedly due to apps not properly entering sleep mode, leading to reduced battery life and potential user frustration.

rows.Title: CPU 과점 증가
rows.Problem: The app 'com.samsung.android.liveeffectservice' has a single thread (ThreadHandler-W) that continuously occupies 10% or more of CPU usage for up to 2 hours, leading to excessive CPU usage. This causes battery drain, device slowing, and overheating. The thread does not properly terminate, resulting in system instability and potential app kill events.
rows.Summarized Problem: A background thread in the LiveEffectService app continuously occupies high CPU usage for extended periods, causing battery drain, device slowing, and overheating.
rows.Severity Reason: The issue causes device to overheat, slow down, and drain battery rapidly, making the device unusable under normal conditions.

rows.Title: Background app excessive battery drain
rows.Problem: Background app consumes over 1% battery in one hour when not charging, especially in PROCESS_STATE_IMPORTANT_BACKGROUND or higher states, leading to poor user experience due to unnoticed battery consumption.
rows.Summarized Problem: A background app continuously drains battery at a rate of over 1% per hour, causing noticeable battery depletion and degraded user experience.
rows.Severity Reason: The app consumes battery at a high rate in background, leading to device unusability and poor user experience.
